item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 9, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. It is as if you were on your phone (314 points | 47 comments)
2. Show HN: Evolving Agents Framework (68 points | 13 comments)
3. Improving on std:count_if()'s auto-vectorization (84 points | 21 comments)
4. Europe bets once again on RISC-V for supercomputing (113 points | 90 comments)
5. My 16-month theanine self-experiment (647 points | 345 comments)
6. Nickel superconductor works above -233°C threshold at normal pressure (54 points | 12 comments)
7. PurrCrypt: Steganographic encryption disguised as pet sounds (54 points | 12 comments)
8. Binocular Shot (24 points | 6 comments)
9. 16-Bit to 1-Bit: Visual KV Cache Quantization for Efficient Multimodal LLMs (56 points | discuss)
10. Infisical (YC W23) Is Hiring for Full Stack Engineers in San Francisco ( | hide)
11. Sublogic Flight Simulator – By Paul Lefebvre (8 points | 3 comments)
12. Goravel: A Go framework inspired by Laravel (121 points | 96 comments)
13. A Post Mortem on the Gino Case (102 points | 59 comments)
14. Layoffs Don't Work (243 points | 412 comments)

20. Building an open-source Wi-Fi Mac layer for the ESP32 (147 points | 23 comments)
21. Magnesium Self-Experiments (82 points | 62 comments)
22. The DOJ still wants Google to sell off Chrome (439 points | 618 comments)
23. Show HN: I built an app to get daily wisdom from Mr. Worldwide (278 points | 74 comments)
24. Orange Pi RV2 is a single-board PC with an 8-core RISC-V processor (61 points | 15 comments)
25. Global coffee trade grinding to a halt, hit hard by brutal price hikes (46 points | 30 comments)
26. Mako: Fast, production-grade web bundler (43 points | 22 comments)
27. US Ends Support For Ukrainian F-16s (841 points | 1545 comments)
28. Hatching a Conspiracy: A Big Investigation into Egg Prices (18 points | 5 comments)
29. LFortran compiles PRIMA (57 points | 15 comments)
30. TeX Live 2025 Released (40 points | 34 comments)
